lead_paragraph: An array of experts rejected Donald Trump’s accusations that Janet Yellen, the Fed’s chairwoman, is holding down interest rates for political reasons.

headline.print_headline: A Prime-Time Attack on the Federal Reserve Is Lacking in Evidence
headline.main: No Evidence to Support Trump’s Attacks on the Fed

snippet: An array of experts rejected Donald Trump’s accusations that Janet Yellen, the Fed’s chairwoman, is holding down interest rates for political reasons....
abstract: Donald J Trump, during first presidential debate, levels extraordinary accusation at Federal Reserve, saying bank is holding interest rates at low levels under direction of Democratic Party; Fed officials and independent observers reject Trump's accusation, saying there is no evidence of Fed, under leadership of Janet L Yellen, is acting in partisan manner or trying to influence election.
